{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Initium Iani|It|Initium Iani}} is the entrance to the [[Passage of Ianus]], the sole path between [[Machimos]] and [[Capitolium]]. Long ago, the Dragon Prince [[Scylla]] was sealed here by the joint efforts of [[Harmost]]s [[Boethius]]<ref name="Last">{{Ref/Quest|The Last Day of Remuria}}</ref> and [[Euergetia]].<ref>Interactable, Caesareum Palace: [[Caesareum Palace#Ancient Engravings #2|Ancient Engravings #2]]</ref></p>}}
